content: after many requests i finally rewrote my popular owl fingerless glove 1 pattern so it can be knit flat on 2 needles and a cable needle but have no worries i made videos using regular worsted weight yarn any knitter with some basic knitting knowledge can easily knit up a pair don t know how to do cable stitches or increases there are youtube videos 2 showing you exactly how to do it it s time to up your knitting game and make some truly awesome stuff you can purchase the ad free version right here from ravelry links in the usual spots or you can read it for free on my website to do so you ll need to click the following link **easy to knit owl fingerless gloves - free knitting pattern** 3 i have a bunch of other knitting patterns that you can read on my website you can see everything i have by clicking the link below **free knitting patterns** 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fingerless-gloves-with-owls 2 https //www youtube com/channel/ucel3qxbt4dn2ykmer2l6l1q sub_confirmation=1 3 https //kweenbee com/easy-to-knit-owl-fingerless-gloves-free-knitting-pattern/ 4 https //kweenbee com/free-knitting-patterns/
